body:
Migrated from #4374: the `CMakePackage` class currently assumes a user-defined `root_cmakelists_dir` is relative to `build_directory`.

More intuitive would be relative to `self.stage.source_path`.

a change (only) affects the packages: `bcl2fastq2` and `cpprestsdk`
title: CMake: root_cmakelists_dir Relative to Source
